title: Technology Portfolio Catalog Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating technology portfolio catalog YAML files in the Public Transportation Information System architecture

technologies.description: List of technologies in the public transportation information system

id.description: Unique identifier for the technology following the pattern technology:XXX

description.description: Brief description of what the technology is and its primary purpose

version.description: Current version being used or recommended

organization.description: The organization or entity that develops/maintains the technology

website.description: Official website URL for the technology

usage.description: Description of how the technology is used within the system

relatedTechnologies.description: List of complementary or related technologies that work with this one

status.description: Current deployment/adoption status of the technology

documentation.description: URL or reference to official documentation
